title: AVAPOW Car Jump Starter, 4000A Peak 27800mAh Battery Jump Starter (for All Gas or Up to 10L Diesel), Battery Booster Power Pack, 12V Auto Jump Box with LED Light, USB Quick Charge 3.0, 4000A peak current, includes 88Wh portable battery charger
descriptions:
Introducing the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter, your reliable companion for all vehicle emergencies! This powerful 4000A peak battery booster is designed to jump-start any gasoline engine and diesel engines up to 10L. Packed with a massive 27800mAh capacity and 88Wh portable battery charger, this device ensures you're never left stranded.

The AVAPOW Car Jump Starter features a 12V Auto Jump Box, making it suitable for a wide range of vehicles such as cars, motorcycles, ATVs, UTVs, lawn mowers, and snowmobiles. It can provide up to 40 jump starts on a single full charge, making it an essential tool for any vehicle owner.

This versatile device also doubles as a power bank, with USB Quick Charge 3.0 technology that charges your devices 75% faster than ordinary power banks. It features two USB charging ports, with the first port supporting 5V/3A, 9V/2A, 12V/1.5A outputs, and the second port supporting 5V/2.4A output. Additionally, it supports Type-C input/output for added convenience.

The AVAPOW Car Jump Starter is equipped with intelligent protection systems that guard against short circuits, low battery, high temperature, and reverse connection. Its rugged design and metal clamps ensure durability and reliability, while its LED light offers three modes - flashlight, SOS, and strobe - to assist you in any situation.

The package includes the Portable Battery Starter, Jumper Cables, USB-C Cable, Cigarette Lighter Converter, Carry Case, and User Manual. Plus, our 24-hour online after-sales team is always ready to assist you.

Don't let unexpected vehicle troubles ruin your day. Get the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter today and drive with peace of mind!
